Fidget Pop Run

April 13, 2025 Tags: Bubble, Monster, run
Come to the colorful world of Fidget Pop Run. Begin a casual arcade game. Race, jump, and pop colorful bubbles along the way. Choose the path to pass according to your characters color. Increase your energy value. Watch out for the wall or youll fail.
